edu.upenn.cis.ppod.saveorupdate
Interface ISaveOrUpdateMatrix

All Known Implementing Classes:
SaveOrUpdateMatrix
public interface ISaveOrUpdateMatrix

Save or update a matrix in the pPOD db.

Author:
Sam Donnelly

Nested Class Summary
static interface ISaveOrUpdateMatrix.IFactory
          Makes ISaveOrUpdateMatrixs.
 
Method Summary
 CharacterStateMatrix saveOrUpdate(CharacterStateMatrix incomingMatrix, CharacterStateMatrix dbMatrix, OTUSet dbOTUSet, Map<OTU,OTU> dbOTUsByIncomingOTU)
          Save or update incomingMatrix.
 

Method Detail

saveOrUpdate

CharacterStateMatrix saveOrUpdate(CharacterStateMatrix incomingMatrix,
                                  CharacterStateMatrix dbMatrix,
                                  OTUSet dbOTUSet,
                                  Map<OTU,OTU> dbOTUsByIncomingOTU)
Save or update incomingMatrix.

If a new matrix is being newly saved, dbMatrix must have the pPOD ID set by the client.

Parameters:
incomingMatrix - the state of the matrix to be saved or updated
dbMatrix - the state of the matrix in the database
dbOTUSet - the transient/persistent OTU set a client has already set with the new state to be saved. This method will call dbMatrix.setOTUSet(dbOTUSet)
dbOTUsByIncomingOTU - maps each incoming OTU to its transient/persistent counterpart. This parameter is used to set the new OTU ordering in dbMatrix as dictated by incomingMatrix
Returns:
dbMatrix
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if dbOTUSet.getPPodId() == null
